item.title: 高盛的哈齐乌斯和科斯汀谈 2025 年的市场和宏观经济
item.description:
在高度不确定的时期，我们应该期待什么

？【原文：

What to look forward to at a time of high uncertainty

】

item.title: 戈尔曼的哈齐乌斯和科斯汀谈 2025 年的市场和宏观经济
item.description: 戈尔曼的哈齐乌斯和科斯汀谈 2025 年的市场和宏观经济【原文：Golman’s Hatzius and Kostin on Markets and Macro in 2025】

item.title: 巴基斯坦通胀降温，为降息提供空间
item.description: 巴基斯坦上个月的通货膨胀有所缓解，为中央银行进一步放宽利率提供了空间。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation eased last month, providing space to the central bank to ease interest rates further.】

item.title: Stellantis 因首席执行官提前离职而陷入困境
item.description: Stellantis NV 首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）的意外离职，使这家吉普越野车和标致汽车制造商在行业发生重大动荡之际失去了明确的领导层。【原文：Stellantis NV Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares’s surprise departure leaves the maker of Jeep SUVs and Peugeot cars without clear leadership at a time of significant upheaval in the industry.】

item.title: 勒庞再次向巴尼耶施压，法国债券下跌
item.description: 在极右翼政党再次威胁称，如果不满足其对 2025 年预算的要求，就将推翻米歇尔-巴尼耶总理的政府之后，法国债券下跌。【原文：French bonds fell after the far-right party renewed its threats to bring down Prime Minister Michel Barnier’s government if its demands over the 2025 budget aren’t met.】

item.title: 奥地利公用事业公司停止付款后，俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司面临更多索赔
item.description: 奥地利一家公用事业公司决定停止支付俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）的供应费用，这可能会为其他国家开创一个先例，因为欧洲希望减少对俄罗斯天然气巨头的依赖。【原文：The decision by an Austrian utility to stop paying for supplies from Gazprom PJSC may set a precedent for others to follow as Europe looks to cut its dependence on the Russian gas giant.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格上涨，寒冷天气预报加剧担忧
item.description: 由于天气预报显示欧洲部分地区天气转冷，欧洲天然气价格连续第二个交易日上涨。【原文：European natural gas prices headed for a second session of gains as weather forecasts turned colder for parts of the continent.】

item.title: 波兰拘留 Pegasus 间谍软件案中央银行董事会成员
item.description: 周一，波兰中央银行管理委员会的一名成员被警方拘留，目的是让他配合议会调查前政府时期使用 Pegasus 间谍软件的情况。【原文：A member of Poland’s central bank’s management board was detained by police on Monday to make him cooperate with a parliamentary investigation into the use of Pegasus spyware under the previous government.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，与瑞波挂钩的 XRP 飙升至第三大代币
item.description: 与瑞波实验室公司（Ripple Labs Inc.【原文：XRP, a token linked to Ripple Labs Inc., has vaulted rivals to become the third-largest cryptocurrency in a $100 billion rally.】

item.title: Nationwide 称英国房价创 2022 年 3 月以来最大涨幅
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，由于强劲的就业市场和工资增长继续支撑着购房者的兴趣，英国房价的涨幅创下了自 2022 年 3 月以来的最大值。【原文：UK house prices rose by the most since March 2022, according to one of the country’s largest mortgage lenders, as a strong jobs market and wage gains continued to support buyers’ interest.】

item.title: 特朗普回国前韩国预算之争考验尹炳世
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈面临着对其领导能力的又一次考验，因为主要反对党正在争夺年度预算的控制权，在韩国为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的回归做准备之际，这一结果将使人们进一步怀疑他制定政策的能力。【原文：South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol faces another test of his leadership as the main opposition party vies to control the annual budget, an outcome that would cast further doubt on his ability to enact policy as the nation braces for Donald Trump’s return.】

item.title: 英国呼吁交易员停止盘前数据发布
item.description: 预计英国将在新年伊始决定是否继续在金融市场开盘前发布关键经济数据，投资者称这种做法会刺激经济波动，并传导至实体经济。【原文：The UK is expected to decide early in the new year whether it will continue to release key economic data before financial markets open, a practice that investors say spurs volatility that also feeds through to the real economy.】

item.title: 对菲律宾副总统杜特尔特提起弹劾案
item.description: 根据政党名单 Akbayan 的声明，周一在众议院对菲律宾副总统萨拉-杜特尔特（Sara Duterte）提出了弹劾申诉。【原文：An impeachment complaint was filed against Philippines Vice President Sara Duterte at the House of Representatives on Monday, according to a statement from the party list Akbayan.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑下滑，房价数据在前
Prosus 出售科技公司股份，上半年实现盈利
item.description: Prosus NV 上半年实现盈利，这家在全球拥有 20 多亿客户的技术投资商出售了在中国和南非的在线业务股份。【原文：Prosus NV reported a first-half profit as the technology investor with more than 2 billion customers worldwide sold stakes in online businesses in China and South Africa.】

item.title: 卡扎克称通胀问题几近解决，欧洲央行将降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克认为，欧洲中央银行应继续削减借贷成本，因为消费者价格增长几乎受到控制。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue to cut borrowing costs as consumer-price growth is nearly in check, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 英国花费 10 亿英镑浪费创纪录的风力发电量
item.description: 今年将是英国风力发电创纪录的一年，至少从浪费的数量来看是如此。【原文：It’s set to be a record year for wind power in the UK, at least in terms of how much goes to waste.】

item.title: 瑞典破产数量将达到上世纪 90 年代危机以来的最高水平
item.description: 据征信机构Creditsafe i Sverige AB称，瑞典今年的破产人数预计将超过10,000人，这是自20世纪90年代金融危机从银行业蔓延到更广泛的经济领域以来从未有过的数字。【原文：Swedish bankruptcy levels are expected to exceed 10,000 this year, a figure that hasn’t been seen since a financial crisis in the 1990s spread from the banking sector into the wider economy, according to credit reference agency Creditsafe i Sverige AB.】

item.title: NAB 任命 Sally Auld 为首席经济学家，接替资深经济学家 Oster
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank Ltd.）表示，已任命莎莉-奥尔德（Sally Auld）为首席经济学家，接替长期担任经济分析师的艾伦-奥斯特（Alan Oster）。【原文：National Australia Bank Ltd. said it has appointed Sally Auld as its chief economist, replacing longtime economic analyst Alan Oster.】

item.title: 对冲基金 "全有或全无 "交易在期权市场获得青睐
item.description: 从大选到央行利率变动，再到战争，各种事件都威胁着市场的动荡，投资者越来越多地寻求在赌对的情况下获得预先确定的回报。【原文：With events from elections to central-bank rate moves to wars threatening upheaval in the markets, investors are increasingly seeking a pre-determined payoff if they bet right.】

item.title: 勒庞会转向吗？法国不能指望它
item.description:
她不是马克龙-巴尼耶政府的成员，没有义务在没有她能接受的预算的情况下拯救政府。【原文：

She’s not part of the Macron-Barnier government, and is under no obligation to save it without a budget she can live with.

】

item.title: 野村的日本企业债券市场排名在调查后下滑
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s ranking in the corporate bond market remains under pressure after its reputation was hit by a market manipulation scandal at a time of greater scrutiny of corporate governance breaches in Japan.】

item.title: 病假率上升导致欧洲每年损失数十亿美元
item.description:
政府和企业急于扭转缺勤趋势

Governments and companies are desperate to reverse the trend of absences

】

item.title: 爱尔兰现任官员将掌握权力，与全球投票趋势背道而驰
item.description: 爱尔兰的主要政党似乎逆转了全球沮丧选民推翻现任者的趋势，这在一定程度上得益于他们拥有大量现金来支持选举承诺。【原文：Ireland’s dominant political parties appear to have bucked the global trend of frustrated voters ousting incumbents, helped in part by a large pile of cash at their disposal to back election promises.】

item.title: Trafigura 贿赂案让大宗商品交易文化在瑞士接受审判
item.description: 周一，全球大宗商品贸易行业一场具有里程碑意义的审判在瑞士开庭，Trafigura 集团及其前首席运营官被指控犯有腐败罪。【原文：A landmark trial for the global commodity trading industry begins in Switzerland on Monday, as Trafigura Group and its former chief operating officer stand accused of corruption.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构反对股票投资者寻求的法律变革
item.description: 韩国最高金融监管机构反对投资者提出的修改公司法以解决韩国股市估值过低问题的建议。【原文：South Korea’s top financial regulator opposes proposed changes to corporate law sought by investors as a way to address undervaluation of the nation’s stock market.】

item.title: 卢比跌至历史新低，增长放缓后债券上涨
item.description: 在数据显示经济增长急剧放缓之后，印度卢比跌至历史新低。由于押注印度央行可能比预期更早降息，债券涨幅扩大。【原文：The Indian rupee declined to a new all-time low after data showed a sharp slowdown in the economic growth. Bonds extended gains on bets the central bank may cut interest rates sooner than anticipated.】

item.title: 路透社称 Kioxia 首次公开募股区间为每股 1,390-1,520 日元
item.description: 据路透社报道，日本内存制造商 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 已为其首次公开募股设定了一个暂定价格区间，该价格区间与之前的指示一致。【原文：Japanese memory maker Kioxia Holdings Corp. has set a tentative price range for its initial public offering that’s in line with its earlier indication, according to Reuters report.】

item.title: 中国制造业活动改善，铁矿石涨势扩大
item.description: 铁矿石连续第二天走高，原因是在中国政府采取刺激措施支撑经济之后，中国制造业活动有所扩大。【原文：Iron ore advanced for a second day as China’s manufacturing activity expanded following Beijing’s stimulus measures to shore up the economy.】

item.title: 日本建议提高养老金巨头 GPIF 的回报目标
item.description: 日本政府提议提高该国最大养老基金的投资回报目标，此举可能为该基金增加股票购买量开辟道路。【原文：The Japanese government proposed a higher investment return target for the nation’s largest pension fund, a move that may open the way for it to increase purchases of stocks.】
